summary: Switzerland  is a small country in Western Europe.
full_text: The Treaty of Basel of 22 September 1499 was an armistice following the Battle of Dornach, concluding the Swabian War, fought between the Swabian League and the Old Swiss Confederacy. The accession of Basel to the confederacy in 1501 is a direct consequence of the treaty.
title: Treaty of Basel (1499)
